name: The Path Between
description:
The Path Between

Guide through a maze made up of different colorful puzzles. You will embark on a wide range of obstacles that you will learn how to overcome.

The journey might start easy and as you progress things will become more tricky.

In this world, you will need to solve puzzles by finding the right path, mix colors and so much more.

== Colorful World ==

Inspired by minimalist color palette design, in a beautiful world full of colors

== Easy to use ==

All you need is your finger to start exploring. Designed to be easy for everyone to pick up, enjoy, and complete.

== Sound ===

Audio reacts to your manipulation of the world. Best experienced with headphones. The soundtrack is produced by https://irenechanmusic.com
